card.text: Kollett Hall was named for Francis "Fred" Kollett, professor of Mathematics and Computer Science and Director of the Academic Computing Center from 1979 to 1997.
Offerings include drop-in tutoring in almost every academic subject and quiet study space.
Peer tutoring offers group learning and individual sessions with trained student tutors.
Aside from individual subject tutors, there is also an academic success tutor to whom students may go with general questions about studying, prioritizing, and time management.
